name: Brick House - Fumas - Toro
additionalNotes: Brick House Fumas have been one of the best-selling brands over the past couple of years. High quality, great flavor, and undeniable value all combine to create one heck of a deal! Brick House Fumas are handmade in Nicaragua with the "Cuban-sandwich" technique; containing the same tobaccos used in the original Brick House. These Fumas are medium to full-bodied with top-notch construction and balanced notes of cream, cedar, and spice. Smooth all the way through with a great burn and draw
